key_risks: Retail sector volatility due to e-commerce disruption and shifting consumer preferences
Economic sensitivity tied to consumer spending and tenant revenues
Regulatory risks from changes in zoning laws, environmental regulations, and tax policies
Tenant concentration risks from reliance on major tenants like Whole Foods and Target
Legal concerns from the ongoing lawsuit (Mitchell v. Federal Realty Investment Trust)
controversies: Ongoing lawsuit (Mitchell v. Federal Realty Investment Trust) with potential reputational and financial risks
